questions.question: What is Second Story?
questions.answer: Second Story is an online marketplace offering a selection of pre-owned books and clothing, promoting sustainability and affordability.

questions.question: How can I create an account?
questions.answer: To create an account, click on the 'Sign Up' button on the top right corner of our website and follow the instructions to complete the registration process.

questions.question: How do you source your items?
questions.answer: We acquire our inventory from individuals looking to give their books and clothing a new home.

questions.question: Are the items authentic and in good condition?
questions.answer: Yes, all items undergo a thorough inspection to ensure authenticity and quality. We do not sell counterfeit or damaged goods.

questions.question: Do I need an account to shop?
questions.answer: No, you can browse and purchase items without an account. However, creating an account allows for faster checkout and order tracking.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept all major credit cards and PayPal for secure transactions.

questions.question: Can I cancel my order?
questions.answer: Of course you can cancel your order if you change your mind - you just need to let us know before we dispatch the order. Once orders have been shipped, we can not cancel them unfortunately.

questions.question: Can I change the shipping address on my order?
questions.answer: Yes - as long as we haven't shipped it yet! If you need to change your address, please email : team@secondstory.tn with your order number and new address. If your order has already been dispatched and is on its way to the wrong address - please inform the shipping company directly.

questions.question: Can I add or remove an item from my order?
questions.answer: We can make changes to a order as long as you let us know before we dispatch the order so we can make the change for you. Please email us with your order number and the change you would like to make!

questions.question: What are your shipping options?
questions.answer: We offer standard shipping for 7 DT

questions.question: Do you ship internationally
questions.answer: Currently, we ship within Tunisia. International shipping options will be available soon.

questions.question: How can I track my order?
questions.answer: Once your order is shipped, you'll receive a tracking number via email to monitor its progress.

questions.question: What is your return policy?
questions.answer: All sales are final. We do not accept returns or exchanges.

questions.question: How can I sell my books or clothing?
questions.answer: We accept gently used books and clothing. Please email sales@secondstory.tn

questions.question: Are there items you do not accept?
questions.answer: We accept all gently used clothing except underwear and only books in good condition. No damaged, torn, or stained items

questions.question: Do you have physical store locations?
questions.answer: Currently, we operate exclusively online.

questions.question: How often do you update your inventory?
questions.answer: We always try to add new items daily. Check back regularly to find the latest additions.

questions.question: Can I submit reviews or feedback?
questions.answer: Absolutely! We value your feedback. You can submit reviews on product pages or contact us directly with your suggestions.

questions.question: Who am I buying from?
questions.answer: You are purchasing a product from another customer who has decided to sell it.

questions.question: Why buy  Second Story?
questions.answer: Buying secondhand is a way to reduce the environmental impact of your fashion choices. The production of new clothing requires a large amount of natural resources. Buying one used item reduces its carbon, waste, and water footprints by 82%. Good for the planet, good for your wallet.
